originalText.text:
Clarke did an AWESOME job mounting my 50” tv to the wall and hiding the wires. He was able to come early for my appointment and was done in less than an hour. Clarke is professional & kind— and even took special care around my skittish/protective dog.

He also was able to provide a certificate of insurance in less than 24 hours (my building requires it). This was refreshing, as it usually can take some vendors a long time to provide one.

Thank you, Clarke!!!

originalText.text: OnTheWallNYC is fantastic! They mounted my 55” Samsung Frame TV perfectly — level, flush to the wall, above a fireplace, all in under 90 minutes. For the quality of service and the price point, there’s no one better in NYC to mount your television.

text.text: OnTheWallNYC is fantastic! They mounted my 55” Samsung Frame TV perfectly — level, flush to the wall, above a fireplace, all in under 90 minutes. For the quality of service and the price point, there’s no one better in NYC to mount your television.

originalText.text:
Clarke is the definition of a professional. Super communicative, on time, knowledgeable, and efficient. My building messed up a coi and he had to come back another day after traveling all the way here - he was not angry with us in the slightest and was very cordial and understanding with our mistake.

The job itself, he did what should take 5 hours in 2, and everything was incredibly precise. He gave spot on recommendations based on maximizing our space.

Can’t recommend this business enough! Will 100% reuse in the future.

originalText.text: We had an excellent experience. Clarke was professional and courteous. He asked us questions to make sure that he was installing the TV as we wanted. The installation looks great, and he didn't leave a mess. We would definitely hire him again.

text.text: We had an excellent experience. Clarke was professional and courteous. He asked us questions to make sure that he was installing the TV as we wanted. The installation looks great, and he didn't leave a mess. We would definitely hire him again.

originalText.text: Clarke did an outstanding job.  He was professional, friendly, checked in and confirmed before his arrival and did exactly what I asked for.  Super high quality work and service at a very fair price.   Thank you!
